caption_text:
G U E S T 🔥T E A C H E R

I’m so thrilled to share @amanda.elemental is coming to share her knowledge and gifts with my Fire Keeper Students this February. 

Amanda is the real deal when it comes to her offerings, she is honest, grounded and walking her walk and talking her talk. Which I find rare in the spiritual world, often folks are highly gifted but not embodied in their human lives. 

Amanda supports seekers, sensitives, and cycle-breakers as they move through awakening, reclamation, and identity reconstruction. Her signature container, Reclamation, guides clients through releasing old systems, regulating new ones, and building a self capable of holding clarity, intuition, and purpose.

Plus she has an amazing sense of humour which is the cherry on the cake. 

I can’t wait to see you 

Thank you 
Thank you 
Thank you 

Check out her offerings @amanda.elemental 

and of course if you are lucky we will get her to offer this workshop again next year to the 2027 cohort of Fire Keepers 

Xo Kim + Amanda 

image from Pinterest
